rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu compliant space, ample natural light and ventilation.
Open-plan living area designed for maximum natural light. Features large north-facing windows and cross-ventilation.
Adjacent to the living room, includes a window wall to enhance natural lighting.
Energy-efficient kitchen with solar exhaust system and ample ventilation via south and east openings.
Vastu aligned guest room with north-facing windows for positive energy.
Eco-friendly utility space housing laundry, storage and a composting facility.
